My Skills

Here are the skills I have gained over the years, from programming languages to modern development frameworks and tools.

Java

Java is a versatile, object-oriented programming language used for building cross-platform applications. I have extensive experience using Java to create robust backend systems and web applications.

Angular

Angular is a popular TypeScript-based framework for building dynamic, single-page web applications. I have built several scalable applications using Angular, leveraging its powerful tools and features like components, services, and RxJS.

Cloud Native Platform

Cloud-native platforms provide the tools to build scalable, reliable applications on cloud infrastructure. My experience includes developing cloud-native apps using platforms such as AWS and Azure.

Kubernetes

Kubernetes is an open-source platform for automating deployment, scaling, and managing containerized applications. I have used Kubernetes to manage microservices and ensure high availability and scalability.

Spring Boot Framework

Spring Boot simplifies the development of Java-based web applications by providing a fast and easy setup. I have used Spring Boot for building RESTful APIs and microservices with high performance and security.
